refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A GtkSpinButton is an ideal way to allow the user to set the value of some attribute. Rather than having to directly type a number into a GtkEntry, GtkSpinButton allows the user to click on one of two arrows to increment or decrement the displayed value. A value can still be typed in, with the bonus that it can be checked to ensure it is in a given range.
The main properties of a GtkSpinButton are through a GtkAdjustment. See the GtkAdjustment section for more details about an adjustment's properties.

refsect2.title: gtk_spin_button_new_with_range ()
refsect2.para: This is a convenience constructor that allows creation of a numeric GtkSpinButton without manually creating an adjustment. The value is initially set to the minimum value and a page increment of 10 * step is the default. The precision of the spin button is equivalent to the precision of step.
Note that the way in which the precision is derived works best if step is a power of ten. If the resulting precision is not suitable for your needs, use gtk_spin_button_set_digits() to correct it.

listitem.simpara: Increment added or subtracted by spinning the widget

refsect2.title: The "adjustment" property
refsect2.para: The adjustment that holds the value of the spinbutton.

refsect2.title: The "climb-rate" property
refsect2.para: The acceleration rate when you hold down a button.
Allowed values: >= 0
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "digits" property
refsect2.para: The number of decimal places to display.
Allowed values: <= 20
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "numeric" property
refsect2.para: Whether non-numeric characters should be ignored.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "snap-to-ticks" property
refsect2.para: Whether erroneous values are automatically changed to a spin button's nearest step increment.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "update-policy" property
refsect2.para: Whether the spin button should update always, or only when the value is legal.
Default value: GTK_UPDATE_ALWAYS

refsect2.title: The "value" property
refsect2.para: Reads the current value, or sets a new value.
Default value: 0

refsect2.title: The "wrap" property
refsect2.para: Whether a spin button should wrap upon reaching its limits.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "shadow-type" style property
refsect2.para: the type of border that surrounds the arrows of a spin button.
Default value: GTK_SHADOW_IN
